entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:24 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
